text: Graham Paul Thorpe (1 August 1969 - 4 August 2024) was an English cricketer. He played for Surrey and England. He was a left-handed middle-order batter and slip fielder. Thorpe appeared in 100 Test matches for England between 1993 and 2005. Thorpe was born in Farnham, Surrey, and was married to Amanda. In May 2022, Thorpe was in hospital after he tried to die by suicide. He died on 4 August 2024, three days after his 55th birthday. He killed himself by stepping in front of a train in Esher, Surrey. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:2024 deaths Category:English and Welsh cricketers Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:Sportspeople from Surrey Category:Suicides in the United Kingdom
title: Graham Thorpe
